alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Putnam; White (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 3:46PM CDT until July 07 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Cumberland County in Middle Tennessee... Northeastern White County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Putnam County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 346 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Monterey, or 12 miles northeast of Sparta, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Crossville, Monterey, Pleasant Hill, Lake Tansi and Slate Springs. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 297 and 321. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
